title: I can't login to league of legends
body:
When ever i try to open league it shows the screen of retiring the legacy client, when I click "launch" my mouse has a loading circle beside it for 3 secs then stops and nothing happens. I've contacted riot support, which didn't help and i've repaired my client which also had no effect. Has someone else had this problem and could help me??
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Hmmmm your OS might not be recognizing League as a safe program any longer. Let's double check your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) really quickly to make sure everything is still in order there, since without those permissions your OS can sometimes block programs if it thinks they're unsafe.
i ended up just wiping my computer and starting a new user and that worked, thanks tho
I would check your background processes and make sure League is not already running. Fully shut it down then try starting it again. My client has done this "fail to launch" a few time this week.
